00042 //----------------------------------------------------------
00043 const void*
00044 RFilePipe::LockPage( unsigned int& pageIdx )
00045 {
00047         while ( _FS_Swap( &_readLock, 1 ) == 1 )
00048                 _FS_Pause();
00049         
00051         if ( _readPage == _writePage )
00052         {
00054                 _FS_Swap( &_readLock, 0 );
00055                 return 0;
00056         }
00057 
00059         SFSFileReadBuffer* curPage = _pages + ( _readPage % _pageCount );
00060         if ( !FS_IsReadComplete( curPage ) )
00061         {
00063                 _FS_Swap( &_readLock, 0 );
00064                 return 0;
00065         }
00066 
00068         pageIdx = _readPage % _pageCount;
00069         const void* ptr = ( const void* )_pages->buffer;
00070 
00072         int prev = _FS_Swap( _pageLocks + pageIdx, 1 );
00073         assert( prev == 0 );
00074 
00076         _FS_Increment( ( int* )&_readPage );
00077 
00079         _FS_Swap( &_readLock, 0 );
00080 
00082         return ptr;
00083 }
00084 
00085 //----------------------------------------------------------
00086 void
00087 RFilePipe::UnlockPage( unsigned int pageIdx )
00088 {
00090         _FS_Swap( _pageLocks + pageIdx, 0 );
00091 }
00092 
00093 //----------------------------------------------------------
00094 bool
00095 RFilePipe::ReadFile( RFile* file, __int64 pageOffset, unsigned int pageCount )
00096 {
00098         while ( _FS_Swap( &_writeLock, 1 ) == 1 )
00099                 _FS_Pause();
00100 
00102         unsigned int readPage = _readPage;
00103         if ( ( _writePage - readPage ) == _pageCount )
00104         {
00106                 _FS_Swap( &_writeLock, 0 );
00107                 return false;
00108         }
00109 
00111         if ( _pageLocks[ _writePage ] != 0 )
00112         {
00114                 _FS_Swap( &_writeLock, 0 );
00115                 return false;
00116         }
00117 
00119         unsigned int writePage = _writePage;
00120 
00122         _pages[ writePage ].complete = 0;
00123 
00125         FS_ReadFile( _pages + writePage, file->GetHandle(), pageOffset * _pageSize,
00126                 pageCount * _pageSize );
00127 
00129         _FS_Increment( ( volatile int* )&_writePage );
00130 
00132         _FS_Swap( &_writeLock, 0 );
00133 
00135         return true;
00136 }
